result.eng: Are you still living in America?

result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ga: tá triúr i meiriceá beirt san astráil beirt eile i sasana agus duine eile san afraic theas

result.eng: The airplanes went back to America.

result.eng: They have been living in America for years.

result.eng: She came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ga: tháinig sí go meiriceá roimh thitim an aontais shóivéadaigh
result.orig: tháinig sí go meiriceá roimh thitim an aontais shóivéadaigh

result.ponchtml: ṫáinig sí go meiriceá roiṁ ṫitim an aontais ẛóivéadaiġShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.

result.eng: He's working for some huge corporation in America.
result.ga: tá sé ag obair d'ollchomhlacht éigin i meiriceá
result.orig: tá sé ag obair d'ollchomhlacht éigin i meiriceá
result.html: tá sé ag obair d'ollchomhlacht éigin i meiriceáHe's working for some huge corporation in America.

result.eng: He spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ga: chaith sé seal i bpáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar mheiriceá

result.eng: America was definitely under attack.
result.ga: bhí meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnte
result.orig: bhí meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnte
result.html: bhí meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnteAmerica was definitely under attack.
result.ponchtml: ḃí meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnteAmerica was definitely under attack.

result.eng: He travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ga: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceá
result.orig: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceá
result.html: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ponchtml: ṫaistil sé ċun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ġlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagróḋ sé ionsaiṫe aeir i meiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.

result.eng: Clearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ga: ba léir go raibh stáit aontaithe mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.orig: ba léir go raibh stáit aontaithe mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir

result.ponchtml: ba léir go raiḃ stáit aontaiṫe ṁeiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollṁóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú meán foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.

result.eng: Race is not discussed publicly in America.

result.eng: It is still the most controversial subject in America, I'd say.

result.eng: I was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.

result.eng: He was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.

result.eng: Black people have been in America since the beginning.
result.ga: tá gormaigh i meiriceá ón tús

result.eng: Estate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
